Name: Playmate Martini
Ingredients: 22.5 ml Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur
22.5 ml De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur
15 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist and 2 drops of bitter on foamy head (spread with a cocktail stick) .
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker.
Review: Cognac-laced apricot and orange. Mellow and easy drinking.
Nutrition: One serving of Playmate Martini contains 176 calories
